Welcome to AmongChat voice chat app!
The Following & Followers features are added. 
If your system language is Spanish, Portuguese, French, German or Russian, you can talk with others speaking the same language in one room. More languages a

Welcome to AmongChat voice chat app!
The Following & Followers features are added. 
If your system language is Spanish, Portuguese, French, German or Russian, you can talk with others speaking the same language in one room. More languages a

Welcome to AmongChat voice chat app!
Now you can set your Roblox username, Fortnite display name, or Free Fire nickname in the channels.
You can also choose different chat languages in the app Settings, to match better.
Find and Voice Chat with y

Welcome to AmongChat voice chat app!
1. More game channels for you in this update - Mobile Legends, PUBG MOBILE, and Call of Duty. Come on to play with your gamer friends!
2. You can find other friends by searching for their in-app nicknames/IDs.
